job_tasks.phrase: Architect and implement the core of our Charging-as-a-Service platform, focusing on scalability, performance, and reliability that can handle global transaction volumes.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core engineering and implementation of a platform, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop cutting-edge AI-powered tools using natural language processing and machine learning to revolutionize plan creation and management in the telecom industry.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase explicitly mentions developing AI-powered tools using NLP and ML, indicating the creation and application of models.

job_tasks.phrase: Leverage and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies to boost development efficiency and solve complex technical challenges in enterprise software.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the integration of technologies into broader enterprise software, a key aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Transform the telecom industry by developing AI-powered charging solutions that enable lightning-fast monetization and unlimited scalability
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the development of AI-powered solutions, which inherently involves modeling and generative techniques.

soft_skills.phrase: pushing boundaries and redefining industry standards

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes developing AI-powered tools using natural language processing and machine learning for business solutions. It also mentions integrating state-of-the-art AI technologies and developing AI-powered charging solutions, aligning with the focus on generative AI applications and user-facing systems.
